item.title: Webclient error - reconnecting in 5,10,15,20,500...50000000
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

well your error I know whats going on because if you use a path like

C:\windows in a string the \ inside it is a starter for little codes or patterns w\e you call em like

\t = TAB
\r\n = new line

so to use \ in a java string alone you have to use 2 of them so

c:\windows would be

c:\windows\cache32whatever in a java string

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error - reconnecting in 5,10,15,20,500...50000000
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Ok i looked at these steps

[code]Step 1:
Open your signlink.java file.
If you scoll about half way through the file (it could be different on yours) you should see the following line.

	String string_0_ = ".file_store_32";

Change the .file_store_32 part to C:\WINDOWS.mpr_file_store_32\

There is an alternative way to fix this.
If you have a line below that line that says
Code:

	String string_1_ = "./cache/";

Then you can do it this way.
Make a directory called “cache” (without quotation warks) on your website. Upload all the contents of any of the private server cache folders (like .mpr_file_store_32) to that folder.[/code]
Tried the first step but it said illegal escape characters error. The second step I tried but it still said error-reconnecting, anyone know a webclient fix for this?

Read full topic
